text: @JoeBiden Actually, you, any of your VP hopefuls or most Democrats would be a complete disaster leading us through a global pandemic. We’ve known about coronavirus & chloroquine since 2005. You & Obama knew it was coming & did nothing. So far, Donald Trump’s done an outstanding job.
